advert.description: <br><font color="red"><strong>&gt;&nbsp;FRENCH AD (JAN. 1985)</strong></font><br><blockquote>"Maxi Basic Yeno SC 3000 : program at full gallop"<

computer.colors: 16-color palette with 16 intensities each (64 colors from a 256-color palette)
computer.description:
The Yeno SC-3000 is the same computer as the Sega SC-3000. It was only rebadged YENO and sold in some european countries through a deal with Sega. Same with second version SC-3000 H (pictured here) which only improvement is its mechanical keyboard.
See the Sega SC-3000 entry for more info...
computer.keyboard: QWERTY full-stroke keyboard (SC-3000h) or rubber keys (SC-3000)
computer.name: SC 3000 / SC 3000H
computer.ports: TV RF output, Composite video out, Cartridge slot, Expansion slot, Tape interface, Joystick (2), External Audio, Serial
computer.sound: Texas Instruments SN-76596 PCM audio processor (6 channel sound)
